sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,AGENT_ID ,MCC_CATEGORY_ID ,AGENT_RATE_1 ,AGENT_RATE_2 ,AGENT_HIGHEST_FEE ,REMARK ,RESERVED FROM AGENT_RATE_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND AGENT_RATE_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(AGENT_ID) =#agent_id#
(MCC_CATEGORY_ID) =#mcc_category_id#
(AGENT_RATE_1) Like '%'||(#agent_rate_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_RATE_2) Like '%'||(#agent_rate_2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#agent_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM AGENT_RATE_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND AGENT_RATE_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(AGENT_ID) =#agent_id#
(MCC_CATEGORY_ID) =#mcc_category_id#
(AGENT_RATE_1) Like '%'||(#agent_rate_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_RATE_2) Like '%'||(#agent_rate_2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#agent_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
